jodd.proxetta.pointcuts

Class ProxyPointcutSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.proxetta.pointcuts.ProxyPointcutSupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProxyPointcut
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AllGettersPointcut, AllMethodsPointcut, AllRealMethodsPointcut, AllSettersPointcut, AllTopMethodsPointcut, MethodAnnotationPointcut

    public abstract class ProxyPointcutSupport
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProxyPointcut
    ProxyPointcut support methods.
